channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 06:54 Alarm to Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District- Lajpetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 06:54 Alarm to Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District- Lajpetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
